item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing hardware interrupts.

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' proccess that have been niced.

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that are not niced.

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent doing nothing.

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running the kernel and its processes.

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The amount of CPU 'stolen' from this virtual machine by the hypervisor for other tasks (such as running another virtual machine).

item.name: CPU: $2 time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing software interrupts.

item.name: CPU: Amount
item.description: The processor load is calculates as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU: Processor load (1 min average)
item.description: The processor load is calculates as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU: Processor load (5 min average)
item.description: The processor load is calculates as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU: Processor load (15 min average)
item.description: The processor load is calculates as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Filesystem: Total disk space on swap
Filesystem: Used disk space on swap
Filesystem: Used disk space on swap (in percentage)
Memory: Available
item.description: Available memory is defined as free+cached+buffers memory.

item.name: Memory: Available in %
item.description: pavailable - неактивная + кэшированная + свободная память по отношению к 'total'.

item.name: Memory: Buffers
item.description: buffers - кэш для таких вещей, как метаданные файловой системы.

item.name: Memory: Cached
item.description: cached - кэш для различных вещей.

item.name: Memory: Free
item.description: free - память, которая доступна для любого объекта запрашивающего память.

item.name: Memory: Shared
item.description: shared - память, которая может быть доступна сразу для нескольких процессов.

item.name: Memory: Used
item.description: used - активная + wired память.

item.name: Processes: Number of processes
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processes: Number of processes $1
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processes: Number of processes $1
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processes: Number of processes $1
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processes: Number of processes $1
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processes: Number of processes $1
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processes: Number of running processes
item.description: Number of processes in running state.

item.name: System: Host information
item.description: The information as normally returned by 'uname -a'.

item.name: System: Number of users logged in
item.description: Количество пользователей находящихся в системе. Для получения значения используется команда who на стороне агента.

item.name: System: Service SMTP with local MTA
Zabbix Agent: Host name of zabbix_agentd running
item.description: Возвращает действительное значение hostname агента из файла конфигурации.

item.name: Zabbix Agent: Ping
item.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for availability check.

item.name: Zabbix Agent: Version of zabbix_agent(d) running

discovery_rule.name: Ubuntu Server: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

item_prototype.name: Filesystem: Used disk space on $1 (in percentage)

trigger_prototype.name: Filesystem: Free disk space is low on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Filesystem: Free disk space is too low on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Filesystem: Free disk space is very low on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOST.NAME}

Filesystem: Free inodes is very low on volume {#FSNAME} on {HOST.NAME}

discovery_rule.name: Ubuntu Server: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

trigger.name: Checksum: /etc/services has been changed
Checksum: /usr/bin/ssh has been changed
Checksum: /usr/sbin/sshd has been changed
CPU: Disk I/O is overloaded
trigger.description: OS spends significant time waiting for I/O (input/output) operations. It could be indicator of performance issues with storage system.

trigger.name: CPU: Load Average is much (avg1)

dependency.name: CPU: Load Average is too much (avg1)

trigger.name: CPU: Load Average is too much (avg1)

dependency.name: CPU: Load Average is very much (avg1)

trigger.name: CPU: Load Average is very much (avg1)
Filesystem: Free disk space is low on volume swap
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.name: Filesystem: Free disk space is too low on volume swap
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.name: Filesystem: Free disk space is very low on volume swap
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.description: Данные от Zabbix Agent'a не поступали более 5 мин.
